dct_title_s: Plans of the old & new city of Peking ye. metropolis of China
dct_description_sm: In upper right-hand corner: Vol. 2. Page 962. Indexed for points of interest. From: Navigantium atque itinerantium bibliotheca ... / John Harris. -- London : T. Woodward, 1744-1748.
